format: dashboard
runtime: shiny

```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(DT)

con <- dbConnect(SQLite(), "data/virtual_production.db")

```

## Database Tables

```{r}
tabsetPanel(
tabPanel(
"Productions",
DT::datatable(
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM Productions"),
options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
),
tabPanel(
"Clients",
DT::datatable(
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM Clients"),
options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
),
tabPanel(
"Crew Members",
DT::datatable(
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM CrewMembers"),
options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
),
tabPanel(
"Assets",
DT::datatable(
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM Assets"),
options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
)
)

```
